com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap

Class AwesomeTextView

  • java.lang.Object
    • TextView
      • com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap.AwesomeTextView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BootstrapBrandView, BootstrapTextView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BootstrapButton, BootstrapDropDown, BootstrapLabel

    public class AwesomeTextView
extends TextView
implements BootstrapTextView, BootstrapBrandView
    This class extends the default Android TextView to supply Bootstrap behaviour. The text color can be set by changing the BootstrapBrand, and scalable Typeface icons can be interspersed with regular text, using the BootstrapText spannable.

        Starts a Flashing Animation on the AwesomeTextView
        Parameters:

        speed - how fast the item should flash
